channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Magic Apprentice
channel.description:
# Magic Apprentice ![:shield:](https://forum.imperium42.com/images/emoji/twitter/shield.png?v=5)
**Support(Neutral)**
**Foul taste of magic (Passive)** - When the cult/unseen tries to convert the target, the collection of magic loses and shot at the target resulting death.
**Trace for magic presence(Day)** - Choose a target to sense magic around Note: the target could be a magic user or someone cast spell at the player - infinite uses
**Magic Collection(Night)** - Collect magic at the chosen target When the target cast magic or someone uses magic at the target, it is prevented and the magic is collected and trace the magic user. - Infinite uses
**Hide (Night)** -You become immune to death tonight. - 3 uses
**Lore**: Magic Apprentice wish to be a true Court Wizard as such she comes to the throne of lies to collect I mean learn magic.
*Your objective is collect 3 magic from different users.*
